conversations.body_text: Hi Davor Fabijanic,    We have made a note for you, but if we ship it from our German warehouse, we will be unable to make changes for you.
Hi, And thank you for the fast response. Do you have any sugestion about that situation? Regards, Davor
Hi Davor Fabijanic,    Don't worry, we'll prioritize shipping your order from our warehouse in China and handle it according to your requirements.
Hi Will that slow down shipping time?
Hi Davor Fabijanic,    Not necessarily; it may be delayed by 1-2 days.
